concise_definition: n. 女名，纳丁（Nadine 的音译）

definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of French origin, derived from the Russian name Nadezhda, meaning 'hope'. It is commonly used in English-speaking countries and carries connotations of grace and optimism.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自法语的女性名字，由俄语名字 Nadezhda 演变而来，意为‘希望’。在英语国家中广泛使用，常带有优雅与乐观的寓意。
definitions.example_en: Nadine was the most thoughtful person in the room, always offering kind words and quiet support.
definitions.example_cn: 纳丁是房间里最体贴的人，总是给予温柔的话语和默默的支持。
